title: Cabbage and carrot salad with spiced yoghurt dressing
ingredients: ['125 g (4½ oz) white cabbage, finely shredded', '125 g (4½ oz) carrots, grated', 'For the dressing', '125 g (4½ oz) low-fat natural yoghurt', '1 tablespoon finely chopped red onion', '1 green chilli, deseeded and finely chopped, optional', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh coriander', '1 teaspoon bottled mint sauce, or 1 teaspoon each chopped fresh mint and white wine vinegar', 'A pinch of salt', '½ teaspoon sugar', 'To garnish: ½ teaspoon ground cumin and ½ teaspoon paprika']
